Terrain

public Terrain(Heightfield heightfield,
               float spacing,
               float elevationScale)
Creates a new instance of Terrain

Parameters:
heightfield - The heightfield to be used as basis for geometry generation.
spacing - the horizontal spacing of heighfield data points (in meters).
elevationScale - the maximum elevation to scale to (in meters)
